channel.title: REQ. Pi based tutorial on how to add models to client! needed
channel.description:
i have no fricking clue on how to add models to my pi, i just found out class8 is actually itemdef, and that i have absolutely no models/customs in there so i dont know how to even start this...
id love a tut for PI based, not ones with the wrong intergers.. thank youuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu!

item.title: REQ. Pi based tutorial on how to add models to client! needed
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

i get errors from my batch file, from the compiler it reads…

24 errors

most are itemdef.java:77 error: cannot find symbol
itemdef.modelrotationy = 473;

most of them are all like this… idk what to do…

Read full topic
item.source: REQ. Pi based tutorial on how to add models to client! needed

item.title: REQ. Pi based tutorial on how to add models to client! needed
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

i am infamy:

Im not going to repeat what i said if you dont know how to convert int’s then dont add models…

What a stupid logic. And what do you mean by convert ints? You ints are ints, you can’t convert them.

@OP
Custom ints go into your class8/itemDef class. You can find renamers around on google, just google something like model renamers or something similar.

Read full topic

item.title: REQ. Pi based tutorial on how to add models to client! needed
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

you obviously didnt understand what i was saying…

let me further explain. my client doesnt have any customs. so i cant just find a common bracket with the ints i can re edit mine into. in other words it no worky work, cuz i kunt put in the wrong intergers that these people share with their models, and dont tell you exactly where to place when your server doesnt haveeee any customs…

btw… if you need help with ur basic lvl 1 portforwarding prob. i can help u.

Read full topic

item.title: REQ. Pi based tutorial on how to add models to client! needed
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Download model’s put them in your cache>raw folder and then add the ints into itemdef.java and if you want it to have stats add them into item.cfg

Read full topic
